import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; const Admission = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', email: '', phone: '', course: '', college: '', category: '', message: '' }); const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Handle form submission here console.log('Form submitted:', formData); alert('Application submitted successfully! We will contact you soon.'); }; const requirements = [ "Caste certificate (SC category)", "Aadhaar Card and Samagra ID", "Academic marksheets (Class X and XII)", "Parents' income certificate", "Photographs (applicant, parents, local guardian)", "Migration certificate (if from out of state)" ]; return (
